paragraph.paragraph:
The Eiffel Libraries folder properties are accessible from the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htmproperties window. To view the properties window:
Select the Eiffel Libraries folder in your EiffelEnvision ../../../structure/project.xmlProject.
Choose View, Properties menu. The properties window may also been shown for any selected item by pressing the F4 keyboard shortcut or by choosing Properties from the Eiffel Libraries folder context menu.

Cluster Count
Indicates the number of top-level ../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Clusters under the Eiffel Libraries folder.

Total Cluster Count
Indicates the number of ../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Clusters under the Eiffel Libraries folder and any their sub-../../../structure/project_items/clusters_and_items/explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Clusters folders.
